basics.name: Shubham Shrivastava
basics.label: Product Manager | Business Analyst | Technology Strategist
basics.summary: Product Manager and Business Analyst with 5+ years of experience in e-commerce, fintech, compliance, and risk analytics. Specialized in regulatory automation, fraud prevention, and data-driven decision-making to enhance business efficiency and reduce operational risks.

work.summary: Driving compliance automation and risk platform development for fintech and banking clients.
highlights: Led AML automation initiative saving $450K annually and reducing manual effort by 35%.
Developed regulatory dashboards in Power BI, cutting reporting time by 40%.
Integrated ISO 20022 & PCI DSS compliance features across multiple systems.
Reduced false positives by 30% through fraud detection model enhancement.

work.summary: Owned product lifecycle for e-commerce risk and compliance tools.
highlights: Designed 0-1 product features that increased conversion by 15% and reduced stockouts by 20%.
Implemented A/B testing to optimize checkout flow, decreasing cart abandonment by 12%.
Led API automation to enhance inventory tracking, saving $60K in operations.

work.summary: Supported banking CRM migration and product integration efforts.
highlights: Led Salesforce data migration project with over 1M records.
Wrote SQL validation scripts, avoiding $30K in compliance risks.

work.summary: Managed product delivery across e-commerce, retail, and payment platforms.
highlights: Designed merchant onboarding workflows, boosting efficiency and $150K in revenue.
Streamlined digital payment gateways and reduced fraud-related chargebacks.
Led end-to-end automation of transaction validation reducing processing time by 30%.

volunteer.summary: Supporting professional development in fintech compliance and product strategy.
highlights: Mentored early-career professionals in data strategy and product planning.
Delivered sessions on automation and risk frameworks for fintech startups.
